languages.text: Мы боремся за клинок, но его острие неумолимо приближается к моему горлу. Касается его. Мучительно медленно протыкает кожу и входит в гортань. Погружается все глубже, касается другой стенки гортани и минует ее. Я все чувствую. Тело мое от боли обмякает.

We struggle for the blade but its point steadily approaches my throat. It touches it. It pierces the skin extremely slowly and penetrates the larynx. It keeps plunging deeper, touches the other wall of the larynx, and passes through. I can feel everything. My body softens with pain.
languages.original_text: Мы боремся за клинок, но его острие неумолимо приближается к моему горлу. Касается его. Мучительно медленно протыкает кожу и входит в гортань. Погружается все глубже, касается другой стенки гортани и минует ее. Я все чувствую. Тело мое от боли обмякает.

traits.locale_text: We struggle for the blade, but its point inexorably approaches my throat. It touches it. Excruciatingly slowly it pierces the skin and enters the larynx. It plunges deeper and deeper, touches the other wall of the larynx and passes through. I feel everything. My body goes limp with pain.

We struggle for the blade, but its point inexorably approaches my throat. It touches it. Excruciatingly slowly it pierces the skin and enters the larynx. It plunges deeper and deeper, touches the other wall of the larynx and passes through. I feel everything. My body goes limp with pain.

We struggle for the blade but its point steadily approaches my throat. It touches it. It pierces the skin extremely slowly and penetrates the larynx. It keeps plunging deeper, touches the other wall of the larynx, and passes through. I can feel everything. My body softens with pain.

We struggle for the blade but its point steadily approaches my throat. It touches it. It pierces the skin extremely slowly and penetrates the larynx. It keeps plunging deeper, touches the other wall of the larynx, and passes through. I can feel everything. My body softens with pain.

We struggle for the blade but its point steadily approaches my throat. It touches it. It pierces the skin extremely slowly and penetrates the larynx. It keeps plunging deeper, touches the other wall of the larynx, and passes through. I can feel everything. My body softens with pain.

We struggle for the blade but its point steadily approaches my throat. It touches it. It pierces the skin extremely slowly and penetrates the larynx. It keeps plunging deeper, touches the other wall of the larynx, and passes through. I can feel everything. My body softens with pain.

languages.text: 私たちは刃を取り合ってもがくが、刃先は着実に私の喉に近づいてくる。刃が触れる。ゆっくりと皮膚を突き破り、喉仏に突き刺さる。刃はさらに深く突き進み、喉頭の反対側の壁に触れ、通り抜ける。すべてを感じる。私の体は痛みでグニャリと倒れ込んだ。
languages.original_text: We struggle for the blade but its point steadily approaches my throat. It touches it. It pierces the skin extremely slowly and penetrates the larynx. It keeps plunging deeper, touches the other wall of the larynx, and passes through. I can feel everything. My body softens with pain.

traits.locale_text: 私たちは刃を取り合ってもがくが、刃先は着実に私の喉に近づいてくる。刃が触れる。ゆっくりと皮膚を突き破り、喉仏に突き刺さる。刃はさらに深く突き進み、喉頭の反対側の壁に触れ、通り抜ける。すべてを感じる。私の体は痛みでグニャリと倒れ込んだ。

languages.text: 我们两人争抢着，想要夺下那把利刃，可利刃的尖端却不断朝我的喉咙逼近。利刃碰到了喉咙，以极慢的速度刺穿了我的皮肤，随后穿透了喉部。它不断地往下陷去，碰到了喉咙的另一端，之后刺穿了另一端的皮肤。这一切我都感觉得清清楚楚，身体也因为疼痛而失去了力气。
languages.original_text: We struggle for the blade but its point steadily approaches my throat. It touches it. It pierces the skin extremely slowly and penetrates the larynx. It keeps plunging deeper, touches the other wall of the larynx, and passes through. I can feel everything. My body softens with pain.

traits.locale_text: 我们两人争抢着，想要夺下那把利刃，可利刃的尖端却不断朝我的喉咙逼近。利刃碰到了喉咙，以极慢的速度刺穿了我的皮肤，随后穿透了喉部。它不断地往下陷去，碰到了喉咙的另一端，之后刺穿了另一端的皮肤。这一切我都感觉得清清楚楚，身体也因为疼痛而失去了力气。

languages.text: Luchamos por el acero, pero su extremo se acerca inexorablemente a mi garganta. La toca. Perfora la piel con una lentitud extrema y penetra en la laringe. Sigue hundiéndose aún más: toca la otra pared de la laringe y la atraviesa. Puedo sentirlo todo. Mi cuerpo se ablanda del dolor.
languages.original_text: We struggle for the blade but its point steadily approaches my throat. It touches it. It pierces the skin extremely slowly and penetrates the larynx. It keeps plunging deeper, touches the other wall of the larynx, and passes through. I can feel everything. My body softens with pain.

traits.locale_text: Luchamos por el acero, pero su extremo se acerca inexorablemente a mi garganta. La toca. Perfora la piel con una lentitud extrema y penetra en la laringe. Sigue hundiéndose aún más: toca la otra pared de la laringe y la atraviesa. Puedo sentirlo todo. Mi cuerpo se ablanda del dolor.

languages.text: Wir kämpfen um die Klinge, doch ihre Spitze nähert sich beständig immer weiter meiner Kehle. Sie berührt sie. Sie durchsticht extrem langsam die Haut und dringt in den Kehlkopf ein. Sie taucht tiefer ein, berührt die andere Wand des Kehlkopfs, und gleitet hindurch. Ich kann alles spüren. Mein Körper wird weich vor Schmerz.
languages.original_text: We struggle for the blade but its point steadily approaches my throat. It touches it. It pierces the skin extremely slowly and penetrates the larynx. It keeps plunging deeper, touches the other wall of the larynx, and passes through. I can feel everything. My body softens with pain.

traits.locale_text: Wir kämpfen um die Klinge, doch ihre Spitze nähert sich beständig immer weiter meiner Kehle. Sie berührt sie. Sie durchsticht extrem langsam die Haut und dringt in den Kehlkopf ein. Sie taucht tiefer ein, berührt die andere Wand des Kehlkopfs, und gleitet hindurch. Ich kann alles spüren. Mein Körper wird weich vor Schmerz.

languages.text: Nous luttons l'un et l'autre pour le contrôle de la lame, mais elle se rapproche inexorablement de ma gorge. Elle la touche. Très lentement, elle vient percer la peau et pénétrer le larynx, s'enfonçant chaque seconde un peu plus jusqu'à atteindre l'autre paroi, qu'elle transperce à son tour. Je sens tout. Sous l'effet de la douleur, mon corps se ramollit.
languages.original_text: We struggle for the blade but its point steadily approaches my throat. It touches it. It pierces the skin extremely slowly and penetrates the larynx. It keeps plunging deeper, touches the other wall of the larynx, and passes through. I can feel everything. My body softens with pain.

traits.locale_text: Nous luttons l'un et l'autre pour le contrôle de la lame, mais elle se rapproche inexorablement de ma gorge. Elle la touche. Très lentement, elle vient percer la peau et pénétrer le larynx, s'enfonçant chaque seconde un peu plus jusqu'à atteindre l'autre paroi, qu'elle transperce à son tour. Je sens tout. Sous l'effet de la douleur, mon corps se ramollit.

languages.text: İkimiz de bıçağı kullanmak için mücadele ediyoruz ancak ucu giderek boğazıma yaklaşıyor. Dokunuyor. Deriyi son derece yavaş bir şekilde deliyor, gırtlağı yırtıyor. Daha da derine gömülmeyi sürdürüyor, gırtlağın diğer tarafına dokunuyor ve orayı da geçiyor. Hepsini hissedebiliyorum. Acıyla beraber bedenim yumuşuyor.
languages.original_text: We struggle for the blade but its point steadily approaches my throat. It touches it. It pierces the skin extremely slowly and penetrates the larynx. It keeps plunging deeper, touches the other wall of the larynx, and passes through. I can feel everything. My body softens with pain.

traits.locale_text: İkimiz de bıçağı kullanmak için mücadele ediyoruz ancak ucu giderek boğazıma yaklaşıyor. Dokunuyor. Deriyi son derece yavaş bir şekilde deliyor, gırtlağı yırtıyor. Daha da derine gömülmeyi sürdürüyor, gırtlağın diğer tarafına dokunuyor ve orayı da geçiyor. Hepsini hissedebiliyorum. Acıyla beraber bedenim yumuşuyor.
